metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22909 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: HotelDruid v3.0.3 was discovered to contain a remote code execution (RCE)vulnerability which is exploited via an attacker inserting a craftedpayload into the name field under the Create New Room module.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
